Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/71st Street
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 69th, and California: due to, street blockage near Western/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 69th, and California: due to, street blockage near Western/71st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
